ValidationRule.description: Prevents edits to Outcome records that are Submitted for Approval and Locked
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISCHANGED( PgM_Acceptance_Status__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Accomplished__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Actual_Date__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Approved_Date__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Approver__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Deliverable__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Issues_or_Blockers__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_L1_Capability__c ) || ISCHANGED( Name ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Planned_Date__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Plans_Next_Week__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Rating__c ) || ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Ref_Link__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Status__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Workstream__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Status__c )) && PgM_Record_Locked__c = true && PgM_Current_Approver__c = false && ISPICKVAL( PgM_Acceptance_Status__c , 'Submitted for Approval')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Outcome has been submitted for approval and the record is locked.
